scores = grid_search(data, cfg_list, n_test)
print(' done' )
# list top 10 configs
for cfg, error in scores[:3]:
print(cfg, error)
Listing 15.47: Example of demonstrating the grid search framework for evaluating an LSTM
model conﬁgurations on the airline passengers dataset.
Running the example, we can see that only two distinct conﬁgurations are evaluated. We
